TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpressionsCollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供使用者介面，以便在設計階段選取和編輯運算式繫結集合。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting and editing an expressions binding collection at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別是物件，可以在設計階段用來選取和編輯集合的運算式繫結，並將運算式指派給控制項屬性。An instance of the class is a object that can be used at design time to select and edit a collection of expression bindings, and assign the expressions to a control property. 設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用和類別的實作並類別，以在設計階段設定控制項屬性的運算式繫結和類別保存執行階段的運算式。A designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the and class implementations with the and classes to set the expression bindings for control properties at design time, and the class to persist the expressions for run time. 運算式字串會參考可當地語系化的資源、 應用程式設定、 連接字串或自訂運算式型別。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 運算式字串是在設計階段繫結至控制項的屬性，並在執行階段中用來判斷屬性的值。The expression string is bound to the control property at design time, and then used at run time to determine the value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EditValue (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, provider As IServiceProvider, value As Object) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EditValue(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, IServiceProvider ^ provider, System::Object ^ value);

abstract member EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj override this.EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，可用於取得其他內容資訊，例如相關聯控的制項。

span.span: An object that can be used to gain additional context information such as the associated control.

param.name: provider
param.span: 服務提供者物件，可透過它取得編輯服務。

span.span: A service provider object through which editing services can be obtained.

param.name: value
param.span: 要編輯的物件執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the object being edited.

summary.span: 使用指定的服務提供者和內容 (Context)，編輯指定物件的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object with the specified service provider and context.

returns.span: 包含所選取運算式的 物件，如果未選取運算式，則為 物件。

span.span: An object containing the selected expressions; otherwise, if no expressions are selected, the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動使用者介面，用於編輯`value`物件。The method launches the user interface for editing the `value` object. 設計工具主應用程式呼叫這個編輯器相關聯的方法時您嘗試編輯的屬性值。The designer host calls the method when you attempt to edit the value of a property that this editor is associated with. 輸入的服務提供者用來取得任何所需中的編輯服務。The input service provider is used to obtain any editing services that are required within the . 設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用和類別的實作並類別，以在設計階段設定控制項屬性的運算式繫結和類別保存執行階段的運算式。A designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the and class implementations with the and classes to set the expression bindings for control properties at design time, and the class to persist the expressions for run time. 運算式字串會參考可當地語系化的資源、 應用程式設定、 連接字串或自訂運算式型別。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 運算式字串是在設計階段繫結至控制項的屬性，並在執行階段中用來判斷屬性的值。The expression string is bound to the control property at design time, and then used at run time to determine the value for the property. 如果使用者取消使用者介面，而不需要修改繫結集合的運算式方法會傳回輸入`value`參數。If users cancel the user interface without modifying the expression binding collection, the method returns the input `value` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEditStyle (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As UITypeEditorEditStyle

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

span.span: An object that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 為指定的內容 (Context) 取得與這個編輯器關聯的編輯樣式。

span.span: Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor for the specified context.

returns.span: 列舉值，表示所提供之使用者介面的編輯樣式。

span.span: An enumeration value indicating the editing style for the provided user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回預設值。The method returns the value by default. 如果中指定的內容，不支援傳回。If is not supported in the specified context, the returns .
